item.title: How to Create a Blog from Scratch with Hugo
item.author: blog@olivergilan.com (Oliver Gilan)
item.description: In this post I’ll walk you through creating the personal blog you’re currently reading using Hugo. When choosing my stack for this blog I had a few requirements in mind: low maintenance, high performance/low bundle sizes, simple clean interface with reusable components, and markdown support. Hugo meets all these requirements with blazing fast compile times as well as no reliance on JavaScript or other libraries that could lead to bloated bundles.
